entities.name: crowd
entities.description: The crowd is described as being in the entrance hall and staring at Harry.

entities.name: marble staircase
entities.description: Harry uses the marble staircase to hurry up and leave most of the crowds behind.

entities.name: upstairs corridors
entities.description: The upstairs corridors are described as being much emptier than the entrance hall.

entities.name: Triwizard maze
entities.description: Harry emerged from the Triwizard maze two months ago with a dead body and claimed to have seen Lord Voldemort return to power.

entities.name: Lord Voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is mentioned as having returned to power, according to Harry.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is described as being stared at by everyone in the school.

entities.name: Gryffindor common room
entities.description: Harry reaches the end of the corridor to the Gryffindor common room.

entities.name: Fat Lady
entities.description: The Fat Lady is a portrait that guards the entrance to the Gryffindor common room.

relationships.description: The crowd is staring at Harry as he walks through the entrance hall.
Harry claimed to have seen Lord Voldemort return to power after emerging from the Triwizard maze.
Harry reaches the end of the corridor to the Gryffindor common room.
Harry comes to a halt in front of the portrait of the Fat Lady.
